content.text: Match ends, Hércules 2, Real Zaragoza 1.
Second Half ends, Hércules 2, Real Zaragoza 1.
Corner,  Real Zaragoza. Conceded by Juan Calatayud.
Attempt saved. Nicolás Bertolo (Real Zaragoza) header from a difficult angle on the right is saved in the top right corner. Assisted by Gabi with a cross.
Foul by Rodri (Hércules).
Gabi (Real Zaragoza) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Goal!  Hércules 2, Real Zaragoza 1. David Trezeguet (Hércules) left footed shot from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Farinós with a through ball.
Foul by Guirane N'Daw (Real Zaragoza).
Rodri (Hércules) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Attempt missed. David Trezeguet (Hércules) right footed shot from the centre of the box is close, but misses to the right. Assisted by David Cortés with a cross.
Attempt saved. Florent Sinama-Pongolle (Real Zaragoza) header from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ivan Obradovic with a cross.
Offside, Hércules. Rodri tries a through ball, but David Trezeguet is caught offside.
Guirane N'Daw (Real Zaragoza) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Foul by Guirane N'Daw (Real Zaragoza).
